title: What are some ways to use information technology to help people find jobs and help jobs find people? - Quora

response.answer_text: LinkedIn can be used to to match roles with people. If you create a LinkedIn Profile at All Star status level, you can be found using a skill search. Your profile can also be used to find appropriate roles to suit you automatically using IT. Once you see a job in LinkedIn you can use your LinkedIn profile to quickly apply (no forms required). There is a free one month Trial to Premium level which also includes access to Lynda (4000 courses) which can be used to add courses and skills to your profile.
